  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2919</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Are Boys and Girls treated the same?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sind die Jungen und Mädchen, die denselben 
behandelt werden?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les garçons et les filles traités sont-ils les 
mêmes ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">São os meninos e as meninas tratados o mesmos?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sono i ragazzi e le ragazze curati lo stessi?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είναι τα αγόρια και τα κορίτσια θεραπευθέντα τα ίδια;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Son los muchachos y las muchachas tratados 
iguales?</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online interactive unit about differences in the way that boys and girls are treated in society</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">online unit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gender</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">equality attitudes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">society</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interaktive Onlinemaßeinheit über Unterschiede 
bezüglich der Methode, die Jungen und Mädchen in der Gesellschaft 
behandelt werden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une unité interactive en ligne au sujet des différences 
de la manière que des garçons et les filles sont traité dans la 
société</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma unidade interativa em linha sobre diferenças na 
maneira que os meninos e as meninas são tratados na sociedade</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'unità interattiva in linea circa le differenze nel 
modo che i ragazzi e le ragazze sono trattati nella società</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση διαλογική μονάδα για τις 
διαφορές με τον τρόπο ότι τα αγόρια και τα κορίτσια θεραπεύονται
στην κοινωνία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una unidad interactiva en línea sobre diferencias de la 
manera que tratan los muchachos y las muchachas en sociedad</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Onlinemaßeinheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschlecht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichheithaltung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesellschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité en ligne</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">société</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade em linha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gender</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atitudes da igualdade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γένος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
